title: Miser's Purse, early–mid-19th century
creditline: Gift of Mrs. William P. Treadwell
description: Knitted miser's purse in green, pink, brown and white, with steel rings and bell-shaped ornaments at each end.

tombstone.epitaph:
Miser's Purse, early–mid-19th century.Medium: cotton
Technique: knitted. Gift of Mrs. William P. Treadwell. 1916-33-167.
